channel.title: Engineering Field Notes
channel.description: Recent content on Engineering Field Notes

item.description: I’m an avid Youtube user because there’re a lot of good videos that always bring me something new. The only problem I have is its machine learning backed recommendation system which usually give me things totally out of sense, like videos in a language that I don’t understand, clickbaits and poorly made videos etc. This system is so sensitive that I may be bombasted with uninterested videos after I accidentally watch a video of a type.
